message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value asset that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1000000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're placing on the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to the value you place on it. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from being comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still a bit below the value I have in mind. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000 was a bit too high for you, but I'm willing to meet you at $1000000 was too high for you, so I'm going to meet you halfway from $1000000 to $950000, which is $50000 below the midpoint. I'll meet you at $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further and meet you at $925000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $925000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll give you a slight concession and meet you at $950000 was too high, so I'll meet you at $925000, and then I'll add a $10000 concession to that. I'll meet you at $915000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
